description: National Visa (Type D) for Work. Includes the new 'Opportunity Card' (Chancenkarte) for job seekers.

meta.min_funds_requirement: **Opportunity Card:** Proof of **13,092 EUR/year** (~1,091 EUR/month) via Blocked Account or Part-time job offer.

add.title: Deficiency Letter / Recognition
add.description: Proof that your foreign degree is recognized in Germany (ZAB Statement of Comparability or Anabin printout).

add.title: Opportunity Card Points (If applicable)
add.description: If not fully recognized: Proof of 6+ points (Language, Experience, Age, Connection to Germany).

add.title: Erklärung zum Beschäftigungsverhältnis
add.description: Declaration of Employment form filled and signed by the employer (For Work Permit applicants).

steps_flow.title: Check Qualification Recognition
steps_flow.description: Verify your degree on Anabin or apply for a ZAB Statement of Comparability.

steps_flow.title: Choose Path: Job Offer vs Opportunity Card
steps_flow.description:
**Job Offer:** Get contract & Employer Declaration.
**Opportunity Card:** Calculate points & open Blocked Account (€13,092).

steps_flow.title: Fast-Track (Optional - Job Offer only)
steps_flow.description: Employer can apply for the Fast-Track procedure for skilled workers (Beschleunigtes Fachkräfteverfahren) in Germany.

steps_flow.title: Book Appointment
steps_flow.description: Book a National Visa appointment at VFS Global.
